item.title: lib
item.description:
only for self-tracking and to stay motivated to read more

reading

  1. hegels world (hegels welt) - juergen kaube
  2. think in systems - donella h. meadows
  3. rust under the hood - sandeep ahluwalia

< pipe

  1. ego is the enemy - ryan holiday
  2. do the work - steven pressfield
  3. 365 days with self discipline - martin meadows
  4. ignore everybody - hugh macleod
  5. the war of art - steven pressfield
  6. moonwalking with einstein - joshua foer
  7. how to take smart notes - söhnke ahrens
  8. the dragonbone chair - tad williams
  9. great expectations (große erwartungen) - charles dickens
  10. blood song (das lied des blutes) - anthony ryan
  11. paradise (das verlorene paradies) - abdulrazak gurnah
  12. more from tad williams

2025

  1. before they are hanged (feuerklingen) - joe abercrombie
  2. the daily stoic (der taegliche stoiker) - ryan holiday
  3. the last argument of kings (koenigsklingen) - joe abercrombie
  4. best served cold (racheklingen) - joe abercrombie
  5. blood song (das lied des blutes) - anthony ryan
  6. peter pan - james matthew barrie

2024

goal: 5/10
